output_list.criticism: The mintCoins function has an integer overflow, allowing the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The mintCoins function uses the now variable as a seed for the random process, which can be arbitrary and potentially disastrous.
The mintCoins function only allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user, which can be abused to create arbitrary users with arbitrary balances.
